title: Analyze Your Text
description: TextUtils gives you a way to analyze your text quickly and efficiently. Be it word count, character count, or more.

title: Free To Use
description: TextUtils is a free character counter tool that provides instant character & word count statistics. It is ideal for writing content within specific limits.

title: Browser Compatible
description: This tool works in all modern web browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. Great for analyzing content in blogs, books, PDFs, or online forms.
